Title: The whole world joins in the jubilation
Publisher: Shanghai huapian chubanshe (上海画片出版社)
Notes: Dignitaries on the balcony of Tian'anmen during the parade on 1 October 1954, the fifth celebration of the National Day of the People's Republic of China. Spread among the many Chinese dignitaries are foreign communist state or party leaders. Exactly in the middle: Mao Zedong, between two Russians.From left to right:Chen Yi (陈毅)He Long (贺龙)Deng Zihui (邓子恢)Deng Xiaoping (邓小平)Hoàng Minh Giám (黃明鑑), Democratic Republic of VietnamPeng Dehuai (彭德怀)Lothar Bolz (博商茨), German Democratic RepublicVáclav Kopecký (柯別茨基), CzechoslovakiaDong Biwu (重必式)Nikolai Mikhailovich Shvernik (什維爾尼克 - Шве́рник), Union of Soviet Socialist RepublicsChen Yun (陈云) Gheorghe Apostol (阿波斯托尔), RomaniaZhou Enlai (周恩来) Kim Il-sung (金日成 - 김일성), Democratic People's Republic of KoreaZhu De (朱德)Nikolai Alexandrovich Bulganin (布尔加宁 - Булга́нин), Union of Soviet Socialist RepublicsMao Zedong (毛泽东)Nikita Khrushchev (赫鲁晓夫 - Хрущёв), Union of Soviet Socialist RepublicsLiu Shaoqi (刘少奇)Bolesław Bierut (贝鲁特), PolandSong Qingling (宋庆龄)Petru Groza (格罗查), RomaniaLin Boqu (林伯渠)Anastas Ivanovich Mikoyan (米高扬 - Микоя́н), Union of Soviet Socialist RepublicsLi Jishen (李济深)Jamsrangiin Sambuu (桑布 - Самбуу), MongoliaZhang Lan (张澜)András Hegedüs (赫格居斯), HungaryLuo Ronghuan (罗荣桓)Georgi Purvanov Damyanov (达米扬诺夫 - Дамянов), BulgariaBehar Shtylla (贝·什图拉), AlbaniaShen Junru (沈钧儒)Guo Moruo (郭沫若)The group on the balcony is closely based on a picture by Xinhua News Agency photographer Chen Zhengqing (陈正青), who is not credited.
Theme: 1 October, National Day of the People's Republic of ChinaParty and State Leaders
